statements: SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE task_status='Completed';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM Tasks WHERE task_due_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE task_labels @> '["Urgent"]';
SELECT * FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_status ASC, task_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_due_date, task_status FROM Tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed'
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_due_date DESC
SELECT task_name, task_labels FROM Tasks WHERE task_labels IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE task_id > 100 ORDER BY task_id LIMIT 3
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE task_due_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Tasks LIMIT 10;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM Tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM Tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY task_due_date ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM Tasks WHERE task_due_date > NOW() ORDER BY task_due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_due_date, task_labels FROM Tasks WHERE task_labels @> '[{"label": "Important"}]';
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT task_name, task_due_date FROM Tasks WHERE task_due_date < NOW();
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE task_labels ->> 'priority' = 'High';
SELECT task_name, label_name FROM Tasks JOIN Labels ON Tasks.task_labels ->> 'label_id' = Labels.label_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE label_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name, label_id FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT label_name FROM labels WHERE label_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description, label_id FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE label_id = 2;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description, label_name FROM tasks JOIN task_labels ON tasks.task_id = task_labels.task_id JOIN labels ON task_labels.label_id = labels.label_id;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, t.task_description, l.label_name FROM tasks t JOIN task_labels tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id JOIN labels l ON tl.label_id = l.label_id WHERE l.label_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM labels ORDER BY label_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT label_name FROM labels WHERE label_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tasks INNER JOIN task_labels ON tasks.task_id = task_labels.task_id

SELECT tasks.task_name, tasks.task_description, labels.label_name FROM tasks INNER JOIN task_labels ON tasks.task_id = task_labels.task_id INNER JOIN labels ON task_labels.label_id = labels.label_id WHERE tasks.task_status = 'Pending'
SELECT task_name, task_description, history_event, timestamp FROM tasks LEFT JOIN task_history ON tasks.task_id = task_history.task_id
SELECT task_name, label_name FROM tasks INNER JOIN task_labels ON tasks.task_id = task_labels.task_id INNER JOIN labels ON task_labels.label_id = labels.label_id ORDER BY tasks.task_name ASC

SELECT task_name, label_name FROM tasks INNER JOIN task_labels ON tasks.task_id = task_labels.task_id INNER JOIN labels ON task_labels.label_id = labels.label_id WHERE tasks.task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY tasks.task_name DESC
SELECT * FROM tasks LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_due_date FROM tasks ORDER BY task_due_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, task_description, label_name FROM tasks JOIN task_labels ON tasks.task_id = task_labels.task_id JOIN labels ON task_labels.label_id = labels.label_id WHERE label_color = 'Red';
SELECT user_id, username, task_name FROM users JOIN user_tasks ON users.user_id = user_tasks.user_id JOIN tasks ON user_tasks.task_id = tasks.task_id WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Completed' ORDER BY task_due_date ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, label_name FROM tasks JOIN task_labels ON tasks.task_id = task_labels.task_id JOIN labels ON task_labels.label_id = labels.label_id WHERE label_color='Red';
SELECT task_name, task_due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_due_date > '2023-01-01' AND task_status='In Progress' ORDER BY task_due_date DESC;
SELECT tasks.task_name, users.username FROM tasks JOIN user_tasks ON tasks.task_id = user_tasks.task_id JOIN users ON user_tasks.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username='john_doe';

SELECT task_name, label_name, label_color FROM tasks JOIN task_labels ON tasks.task_id = task_labels.task_id JOIN labels ON task_labels.label_id = labels.label_id ORDER BY label_color ASC, task_name DESC;
